comments.body: My fault, I fixed it shortly after committing the buggy version, sorry.

description:
CVS version 040527 15:00 CEST

jakarta-tomcat-5/build.xml:28: Element type "property" must be followed by
either attribute specifications, ">" or "/>".

<property name="ant-launcher.jar       value="${ant.home}/lib/ant-launcher.jar"/>
must be
<property name="ant-launcher.jar"       value="${ant.home}/lib/ant-launcher.jar"/>

ant-launcher.jar are missing in apache-ant-1.5.4/lib works with apache-ant-1.6.1/lib
